advertiser.description: Name of the advertiser, e.g. amazon, ebay, bestbuy etc

block_id.description: A unique identifier for the QuickSuggest link

context_id.description: A UUID representing this user. Note that it's not client_id, nor can it be used to link to a client_id

experiments.description: An object to record all active experiments, experiments IDs are stored as keys, and the value object stores the branch information. Example: {"experiment_1": {"branch": "control"}, "experiment_2": {"branch": "treatment"}}. This deprecates the "shield_id" used in activity-stream and messaging-system.

position.description: The placement of the QuickSuggest link (1-based)

reporting_url.description: The reporting URL of the ad, normally pointing to the ad partner's reporting endpoint. It's URL encoded

request_id.description: The request identfier for every Merino API request made by Firefox

scenario.description: The scenario of the QuickSuggest user experience
